mapper.select: SELECT A.ORDER_QUANTITY ,B.PRODUCT_NAME ,B.PRODUCT_PRICE FROM ORDER A INNER JOIN PRODUCT B ON A.PRODUCT_ID = B.PRODUCT_ID WHERE 1=1 AND A.CREATED_AT BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_DAYS(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'),-3),'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND ROWNUM <= 5]> </select> </mapper>
